name: FARM ATTACK: Action RPG Unusual Game
blurb: Play the role of Geremia the Farmer and defend the family farm from a horde of hungry unusual insects.  Protect your sweetcorn!

rewards.reward: Help us weed: take part of the \u201cFarm Attack\u201d story! You will receive our heartfelt thanks and a unique desktop background for your computer.
Help us sow the field: You will receive a downloadable copy of the finish game (on iPhone or iPod).

You will receive a downloadable copy of the finish game (Android) plus an exclusive Kickstarter in-game incredible weapon: the proton backpack, an unauthorized nuclear accelerator which Geremia came across many years ago in New York whilst on the set of a popular ghost movie. Your name will also be added to the family album.

Help us water the corn shrubs: You will receive a downloadable copy of the finish game (on iPhone, iPod, iPad or Mac OSX)  plus an exclusive Kickstarter in-game incredible weapon: the proton backpack, an unauthorized nuclear accelerator which Geremia came across many years ago in New York whilst on the set of a popular ghost movie. Your name will also be added to the family album.

You will receive a downloadable copy of the finish game (on PC) plus an exclusive Kickstarter in-game incredible weapon: the proton backpack, an unauthorized nuclear accelerator which Geremia came across many years ago in New York whilst on the set of a popular ghost movie. Your name will also be added to the family album.

The plants need a parasite killer: In addition to the game (IOS or MAC OSX) plus an exclusive Kickstarter in-game  weapon and your name added to the family album, you will receive the developers' diary (PDF VERSION). The diary will contain the artworks, ideas, backgrounds, the initial sketches, the characters, the story and all the secrets of \u201cFarm Attack\u201d.

Get TWO downloadable copies of the finished game. One for you and one for a friend. Plus an exclusive Kickstarter in-game incredible weapon: the proton backpack. Your name will also be added to the family album.

Watering needed, quick!: you will receive the game (IOS or MAC OSX) plus an exclusive in-game Kickstarter weapon (proton pack), an exclusive puzzle and your name will be added to the family album. Free shipping in worldwide.

Remove those pebbles from the soil: you will receive the game (IOS or MAC OSX) plus an exclusive Kickstarter in-game  weapon, a personalized T-shirt and your name will be added to the family album. Free shipping in worldwide.

Help us build the fencing: this is a job for hard workers and deserves a reasonable reward! You will receive the game (IOS or MAC OSX) plus an exclusive Kickstarter in-game  weapon (proton pack) and the developers' diary (printed version). The diary will contain the artworks, ideas, backgrounds, the initial sketches, the characters, the story and all the secrets of \u201cFarm Attack\u201d. Your name will be added to the family album. Free shipping in worldwide.

What is that?: you will receive the game (IOS or MAC OSX) plus an exclusive Kickstarter in-game  weapon, a collectable action figure of \u201cNewborn Snail\u201d! Made and hand painted by the \u201cFarm Attack\u201d designer (Made in Italy). Your name will be added to the family album. Free shipping in worldwide.

Someone is repainting the farm: enter the story of \u201cFarm Attack\u201d Your name will be engraved in Italic letters on one of the scenes of the game forever! You will receive also the game (IOS or MAC OSX) plus an exclusive Kickstarter in-game  weapon. Your name will be added to the family album.

Passion for insects?: Your name will be assigned to one of the last five level bosses. In addition you will receive the game with all the before mentioned digital contents and  the exclusive developers' diary (printed version), the T-shirt and the puzzle. Free shipping in worldwide.

The exclusive collectable handmade figurine of the boss \u201cKing Caterpillar\u201d autographed by the designer with a personal inscription on its base. (Made in Italy).  In addition you will receive the game with all the before mentioned digital contents and  the exclusive developers' diary (PDF version). Free shipping in worldwide.

Enlist with the insects!: you'll be credited as an "Executive Producer" and the designer will create an in-game insect which will be named after you. This insect will be created according to your own instructions and will often appear in the game.\r\nIn addition you will receive the game with all the before mentioned digital contents and  the exclusive developers' diary (PDF version).

Happily ever after: you'll be credited as an "Executive Producer" and get professional 16 Litre copper Backpack Pressure Sprayer (Made in Italy) suitable for left and right handed use, customized by the \u201cFarm Attack\u201d's designers! Furthermore you will receive the game with all the before mentioned digital contents and  the exclusive developers' diary (PDF version), the T-shirt and the puzzle. Your name will be added to the family album. Free shipping in worldwide.
